a.title: Legend for this format

title.value: Cross-version Extension `R5.Permission` for use in FHIR R4

description.value: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `Permission` for use in FHIR R4.

purpose.value:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the element `Permission` as defined in FHIR R5 in FHIR R4.
The source element is defined as: `Permission` 0..* `Permission`
Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as: * R5 `Permission` 0..* `Permission`
Following are the generation technical comments: Element `Permission` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `Permission` is not mapped.
